dimensions: Warp x Weft: 202 x 128 cm (79 1/2 x 50 3/8 in.)
title: Le Feu
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: compound satin weave
description: Dark brown ground with bold pattern of orange flames and swirling gold clouds of rising smoke forming paisley-like forms; salamanders move among the flames. Le Feu is one of a series of silks representing the four elements (earth, air, fire and water) exhibited at the Exposition Internationale des Arts Decoratifs, Paris, 1925.
name: Textile
